## Height class

A Wrapper for the [Height API](https://www.notion.so/API-documentation-643aea5bf01742de9232e5971cb4afda)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Height extends Methods 
```
**Extends:** Methods

## Remarks

To use Height API, you have to get a secret key. Go to [Height app](https://height.app) and get secret key in 'Settings &gt; API'.
